Good quality as usual. The only problem is that there is a Cinavia Error Message 3 when played on my PS3

Unfortunately, there is NO control over Ciniva and movies on the PS3 consol. Only solution is to play it from your computer via HDMI cable, or play useing the PS3 Media Server client (from PC.) Much easier to play from computer directly tho.

Good copy for the size and subs are in sync.

thanks YIFI
